data.text:
About University Hills Subdivision

University Hills Subdivision is a prime residence in University Hills Subdivision, Caloocan. Living here allows you to experience urban living, as you’ll be close to almost all establishment types. Add to that the bustling neighborhoods surrounding the subdivision, and you’ll undoubtedly live the dynamic city life here.

University Hills Subdivision Features and Amenities

The subdivision is already filled with houses of varying sizes, configurations, and exterior designs, and it mostly offers pre-owned units to interested buyers. These pre-owned units are well-maintained and may have been renovated to ensure their safety and robustness.

Large, exquisite homes are also available at University Hills Subdivision in the strategic University Hills Subdivision, Caloocan. These are ideal if you have a medium to large-sized family. Some units are already furnished, so you have little to no fixes to think about. In terms of security, you don’t have to worry about anything as the subdivision has reliable 24-hour safety measures in place.

Nearby Landmarks

University Hills Subdivision is also close to LRT-1 Monumento Station and Caloocan Railway Station, so traveling to other urban areas should be relatively easy.

Other nearby landmarks include:

Parade Ground - University Football Field

Hwa Chong Buddhist Temple

Sangandaan

Candyman Corporation

Marcelo Compound

GIC Compound

Financing Options

If you need additional funds to purchase a property for sale at University Hills Subdivision in 3Q2023, think about applying for a bank loan or a Pag-IBIG loan. Grants of up to PHP 6 million are available to Pag-IBIG members who have contributed for at least 24 months. Banks grant loan amounts depending on your credit score. SSS housing loans are also available for home renovations and improvements.

Why University Hills Subdivision is a Perfect Subdivision Option for You

Getting a University Hills Subdivision home for sale is a wise investment if you consider living in a progressive neighborhood. Here, convenience won’t be an issue as anything from schools, hospitals, places of worship, and leisure hotspots will be within reach.

The development is also amazingly close to transportation hubs, allowing easy access to other metropolitan cities such as Manila, Quezon City, and Makati.

Living in this subdivision takes you to all the places you need to be in. With such an amazing location, getting a unit here is worth every penny. Aside from having a conveniently-located home, you’ll have plenty of lifestyle options and places of interest to visit. Hence, being at University Hills Subdivision won’t give you dull moments.

If you choose to buy a unit and then rent it out later, you are also sure to get a great return on investment. Caloocan City is a highly-populated area, so rentals here can provide a steady income flow.

About Caloocan

University Hills Subdivision is a neighborhood in the city of Caloocan, specifically in Barangay 80. The area is surrounded by several commercial establishments, making it quite a bustling place. One of the city's finest universities, the University of the East, is located only a few minutes away from University Hills Subdivision.
